alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 18 at 2:14PM MST until February 20 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Blowing snow and drifting snow also possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Montana. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Much colder temperatures and hazardous wind chills are expected through most of next week.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
